Import proc
to import the data
```{r}
library(haven)
orange <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/orange.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)
View(orange)
```


data wrangle
cleaning up the data
& data viz

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(orange) +
 aes(x = PRICE, y = QUANT, colour = YEAR) +
 geom_point(size = 1L) +
 scale_color_gradient() +
 theme_minimal()
```
